name: Facebook Chat - Hide Offline, Dim Idle + Mobile
description:
Please rate or leave a comment if you liked it or have an idea for something new, cheers!

UPDATE 15/80/2012
Chrome extension, since you have to have it on the chrome store now. This is what I'll be updating -- if you want one for a different browser, let me know!
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/enkhogafcknbdkjijlkpihlilamomccp

- Hides offline friends from chat list
- Hide / Dim / Leave Mobile users alone
- Makes people who're idle dimmer
- Changes the colours of idle / offline chat tabs slightly (see screenshot)
- Gets rid of some adverts in the right sidebar
